verbose_text: Also, the pooled analysis demonstrated that the IL-6 levels in cirrhotic patients (MD = -6.98; 95% CI : -12.91 -1.05; p < 0.02) and patients with hepatitis (MD = -8.43; 95% CI : -11.91 -4.95; p < 0.00001) were significantly lower than the level in HCC patients, and the subgroup analyses had high heterogeneity.
